name: videoeditor
description: Your Creative Copilot for Video Editing
readme_summary: This repository provides an open-source, AI-powered video editing platform that offers advanced multi-track editing, real-time previews, and fast exports. It aims to be a user-friendly alternative to popular tools like Capcut and Canva, with features like an AI assistant for automated edits and a smart media library.
primary_use_case: To provide a user-friendly, AI-enhanced, open-source video editing experience for creating and exporting videos.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, anthropomorphic robot assistant with a palette and brush, standing in a vibrant digital studio. The robot is effortlessly painting a dynamic video timeline, with clips of footage flowing from a digital cloud into its brush. On one side, raw footage streams in like raw paint, and on the other, a polished, animated video emerges, complete with transitions and effects. Subtle UI elements showing editing controls and AI suggestions are integrated into the studio's background. The overall mood is creative and collaborative, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with bright, engaging colors and clear, readable details.

name: pytgcalls
description: Async client API for the Telegram Calls
readme_summary: PyTgCalls is an asynchronous Python library that enables developers to integrate Telegram group voice call functionalities into their applications. It leverages MTProto and WebRTC, working with popular MTProto libraries like Pyrogram and Telethon to facilitate voice and video calls in channels and chats.
key_features: Async client API for Telegram group voice calls
Integration with MTProto libraries (Pyrogram, Telethon, Hydrogram)
Support for voice and video calls in channels and chats
Functionality for joining as channels or chats
Control features like mute/unmute, pause/resume, volume control
Prebuilt wheels for macOS, Linux, and Windows
primary_use_case: Enabling developers to programmatically control and participate in Telegram group voice and video calls within their Python applications.
cover_image_prompt: A digital conductor standing at a console, orchestrating a symphony of sound waves and video streams flowing into a stylized Telegram group chat icon. The conductor uses glowing digital batons to control individual streams, with visual cues showing mute, play, and volume adjustments. Subtle UI elements resembling chat interfaces and code snippets are integrated into the console. The background is a soft, abstract representation of a network. The overall mood is one of seamless control and connectivity. Style: 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic and vibrant, glowing accents.

name: llm-council
description: LLM Council works together to answer your hardest questions
readme_summary: LLM Council is a local web application that leverages multiple large language models (LLMs) to answer complex questions. It sends queries to various LLMs, has them review and rank each other's responses, and then synthesizes a final answer using a designated 'Chairman' LLM.
key_features: Chairman LLM for final response synthesis
primary_use_case: To provide more comprehensive and accurate answers to complex questions by aggregating and evaluating responses from multiple LLMs.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, ancient council of diverse robotic and ethereal beings, each representing a different AI model (e.g., one with a Google-like lens, another with an OpenAI-like circuit pattern). They are gathered around a central holographic orb displaying a complex question. Each AI is contributing its unique perspective, with streams of data flowing from them towards the orb. A distinguished 'Chairman' AI, perhaps with a more ornate design, is synthesizing these streams into a single, clear, glowing answer emanating from the orb. The scene is a futuristic, minimalist chamber with subtle UI elements and glowing data particles. The repository name 'LLM Council' is subtly etched on a nearby console. Style: 3D isometric illustration with a clean, high-tech aesthetic and a vibrant, focused color palette.

name: neovate-code
description: Neovate Code is a code agent to enhance your development. You can use it to generate code, fix bugs, review code, add tests, and more. You can run it in interactive mode or headless mode.
readme_summary: Neovate Code is a TypeScript-based coding agent designed to enhance developer workflows. It assists with tasks such as code generation, bug fixing, code review, and test creation, operating in both interactive and headless modes.
primary_use_case: To act as an AI-powered assistant for developers, automating and improving various aspects of the software development lifecycle.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan, representing Neovate Code, is meticulously sculpting a complex digital structure from raw code blocks. The artisan uses a glowing chisel and hammer, transforming messy, tangled code into clean, organized blueprints and functional components. Input code is shown as rough, unrefined stone, while the output is depicted as polished, glowing architectural elements. Subtle UI elements displaying code suggestions and progress bars are integrated into the scene. The overall mood is one of creation and refinement in a modern, well-lit workshop. The image should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, futuristic aesthetic and vibrant, contrasting colors.

name: arch-cleaner
description: A bash script to perform routine maintenance and cleanup tasks on Arch Linux systems.
readme_summary: Arch-Cleaner is a bash script designed for Arch Linux users to automate routine system maintenance and cleanup tasks. It offers configurable options for updating packages, removing unused files and cache, cleaning logs, and more, with safety features like backups and optional aggressive modes.
primary_use_case: Automating system maintenance and cleanup for Arch Linux.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent digital gardener tending to a vibrant, organized digital garden representing an Arch Linux system. The gardener uses a watering can labeled 'pacman' to nurture healthy plants (updated packages) and a specialized pruning tool to trim away dead branches and weeds (orphaned packages, cache). Small digital particles representing clean logs and temporary files float away like dandelion seeds. The scene is set in a clean, modern digital landscape with subtle UI elements showing system health metrics. The overall mood is one of order and efficiency, with a focus on growth and tidiness. The art style should be a clean, 3D isometric illustration with a bright, organized color palette.
